DOC.brief_title: Study Of Weight-Based Versus Standard Dose Enoxaparin Thromboprophylaxis In High-Risk Hospitalized Cancer Patients
DOC.detailed_description: In phase II trial , high risk hospitalize cancer patient enrol randomized standard dose enoxaparin versus intermediate dose ( weight adjust ) enoxaparin thromboprophylaxis . Study subject administer enoxaparin hospitalization double-blinded manner . Following completion 14 day , study arm unblinded low extremity ultrasound perform standard dose enoxaparin arm order accurately determine overall cumulative incidence thrombosis group .
